comment:
* This class represents an IpSecTunnelInterface * *

IpSecTunnelInterface objects track tunnel interfaces that serve as * local endpoints for IPsec tunnels. * *

Creating an IpSecTunnelInterface creates a device to which IpSecTransforms may be * applied to provide IPsec security to packets sent through the tunnel. While a tunnel * cannot be used in standalone mode within Android, the higher layers may use the tunnel * to create Network objects which are accessible to the Android system. * @hide

methods.name: public String getInterfaceName()
methods.comment: Get the underlying SPI held by this object.

methods.name: public void addAddress(@NonNull InetAddress address, int prefixLen) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Add an address to the IpSecTunnelInterface * *

Add an address which may be used as the local inner address for * tunneled traffic. * * @param address the local address for traffic inside the tunnel * @param prefixLen length of the InetAddress prefix * @hide

methods.name: public void removeAddress(@NonNull InetAddress address, int prefixLen) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Remove an address from the IpSecTunnelInterface * *

Remove an address which was previously added to the IpSecTunnelInterface * * @param address to be removed * @param prefixLen length of the InetAddress prefix * @hide

methods.name: public void close()
methods.comment:
* Delete an IpSecTunnelInterface * *

Calling close will deallocate the IpSecTunnelInterface and all of its system * resources. Any packets bound for this interface either inbound or outbound will * all be lost.

methods.name: protected void finalize() throws Throwable
methods.comment: Check that the Interface was closed properly.

methodNames: public void addAddress(@NonNull InetAddress address, int prefixLen) throws IOException
public void removeAddress(@NonNull InetAddress address, int prefixLen) throws IOException
